淪.definition: to sink (into ruin, oblivion); to be reduced to

淪亡.definition: (of a country) to perish; to be annexed; subjugation (to a foreign power)

淪喪.definition: to be lost; to be ruined; to perish; to wither away

淪浹.definition: to be deeply affected; moved to the core

淪為.definition: to sink down to; to be reduced to (sth inferior)

淪肌浹髓.definition: lit. penetrate to the marrow (idiom); deeply affected; moved to the core

淪落.definition: to degenerate; impoverished; to fall (into poverty); to be reduced (to begging)

淪陷.definition: to fall into enemy hands; to be occupied; to degenerate; to submerge
